title: Democratic Ads Hit Trump Over Coronavirus - The Wall Street Journal
description: Democratic Ads Hit Trump Over Coronavirus The Wall Street Journal Biden mocked after apparent teleprompter issue during coronavirus remarks: ‘Let me go to the second thing’ Fox News Biden: Trump's 'failure of planning and preparation' worsened coronavirus cri…
content: Democrats are torn over whether it is acceptable in the middle of a national crisis to run political ads attacking President Trumps handling of the coronavirus pandemic, but one of the partys largest outside groups is placing a $6 million bet that it is a sma… [+269 chars]
